com.aj.android.commons.java

Class DateTimeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aj.android.commons.java.DateTimeUtils

  • public class DateTimeUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of Date and Time Utils. Contains lot of method for adding, subtracting various fields in date. Formatting, parsing and calculating difference between two given dates and other such utilities.
    Author:
    Akhil Jain.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DateTimeUtils.Month
      Months of the year.
      static class  DateTimeUtils.Weekday
      Days of the week.

      • parseStringToDate

        public static java.util.Date parseStringToDate(java.lang.String dateString,
                                               java.lang.String sourceDateFormat,
                                               java.util.Locale locale)
                                        throws java.text.ParseException
        Parse String to Date based on given date format using the provided Locale.
        Parameters:
        dateString - -String which has to be parsed.
        sourceDateFormat - -String format of the date.
        locale - -Locale to be used.
        Returns:
        -Date parsed date.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - exception when parsing the date.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if string parameter are blank or 0 - length.

        Format one date to another date based on given source and destination format using the provided Locale.

      • getDaysInMonth

        public static int getDaysInMonth(java.lang.String year,
                                 java.lang.String month)
        Gets the number of days present in the given year and month.
        If blank, empty or null argument is passed, -1 will be returned.
        Parameters:
        year - -year in String form.
        month - -month in String form.
        Returns:
        int number of days in the given month in given year.

      • getTodayDate

        public static int getTodayDate()
        Gets the date / day element from today date.
        Internally calls getDayFromDate(Date)
        E.g., 
              getTodayDate() = 9
      //where today date is Oct 09 12:04:47
        Returns:
        int -the date/day from today.

        public static java.util.Date getNextMonth()
        Get next month from today date.
        Internally calls getNextMonth(Date).
        Returns:
        Date -a new object with same date / day as today in next month.

      • getNextMonth

        public static java.util.Date getNextMonth(java.util.Date date)
        Get next month from given date.
        Parameters:
        date - -Date object.
        Returns:
        Date -a new object with same date / day from given date in next month.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.

      • getNthOfMonth

        public static java.util.Date getNthOfMonth(int nth,
                                           DateTimeUtils.Weekday weekday,
                                           DateTimeUtils.Month month,
                                           int year)
        Gets the nth date from the given week, month and year.
        Parameters:
        nth - -int value specifying nth value required.
        weekday - -week from the DateTimeUtils.Weekday.
        month - -month from the DateTimeUtils.Month.
        year - -int year.
        Returns:
        Date -a new object date with nth date based on specified values.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.

        -String object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
